SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.rmi

Class RmiClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.rmi.RmiClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAction
public class RmiClient extends Object implements ClientAction
The RmiClient class handles the connection to the RMI server and allows clients to interact with the game through remote method invocations.

    • placeCardOnCodex

      public void placeCardOnCodex(Player player, int index, boolean frontCard, int row, int col) throws RemoteException, Exception
      The client places a card in the Codex.
      Specified by:
      placeCardOnCodex in interface ClientAction
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      index - The index of the card in the player's hand to be placed.
      frontCard - A boolean indicating whether to place the front (true) or back (false) side of the card.
      row - The row in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      col - The column in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.
